definition: thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]
to cut/to slash/to scratch (cut into the surface of sth)/to strike (a match)
to delimit/to transfer/to assign/to plan/to draw (a line)/stroke of a Chinese character

sentences.english: Semidefinite programming is an extension of linear programming.
sentences.chinese: 半定規劃是線性規劃的一種推廣。

sentences.english: AimIn order to get a numerical algorithm which is simple and efficient for a class of linear programs problem.
sentences.chinese: 目的爲得到一類線性規劃的簡單有效的數值算法。

sentences.english: A standard form of interval linear programming was defined.
sentences.chinese: 定義了區間線性規劃的標準型。

sentences.english: In this paper, bilevel linear programming with fuzzy coefficients is studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究具有模糊係數的兩層線性規劃問題。

sentences.english: Here the single-goal method in planning such as linear programming may not be suitable any more.
sentences.chinese: 這時，線性規劃等單一目標的規劃方法已不適應。

sentences.english: For example, he will be the introduction of linear programming to minimize the practice of transportation costs.
sentences.chinese: 例如，他將線性規劃引入最小化運輸成本的實踐中。

sentences.english: The paper enquires into the applicability of the optimum linear plan method to masterplan for land utilization.
sentences.chinese: 探討最優線性規劃法對土地利用總體規劃的適用性。

sentences.english: In this paper, an iterative formula to solving non-degenerate LP to optimality is given.
sentences.chinese: 本文給出了求非退化線性規劃最優解的迭代公式。

sentences.english: In goal-seeking optimization problems, linear programming problems are the most common.
sentences.chinese: 線性規劃是目標優化問題中最常用的模型。

sentences.english: This paper presents a new implicit enumerative algorithm for integer linear programs.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一種求解整數線性規劃的新的隱數算法。

sentences.english: It is typical that the method of linear programming is applied to multisensor management.
sentences.chinese: 線性規劃方法在多傳感器管理中的應用已比較經典。
